question:
Your next-door neighbour likes to listen to music late at night. Because of the loud music, you often lose sleep. Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letter
-describe the situation -explain the problems it is causing you -offer at least one solution
text: I am writing to you regarding high pitch songs of yours that you play nowadays at late night, which is not helping my rest.

My doctor has suggested me a sleeping pill due to my lack of sleep recently, which is not assisting because of your loud tune at night regularly. Furthermore,  the doctor has warned me that I could suffer a stroke if I fail to manage sleep.

About the issues, your rock music has a lot of screaming and bad language, which my next door neighbour was also complaining about yesterday. In addition, the children are learning poor choice of words cause of your music.
Therefore, we are requesting you to play your tune in the early evening hours when no one sleeps, and it will not disturb neighbours rest as well. We are conducting a meeting to solve this issue.

error_list.error_des: It appears that next door is missing a hyphen. Consider adding the hyphen(s).
